argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapfval.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmapfval.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | pmapfval.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elex | |- ( K e. C -> K e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( Atoms ` k ) = ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( Atoms ` k ) = A ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( le ` k ) = ( le ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( le ` k ) = .<_ ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_breqd | |- ( k = K -> ( a ( le ` k ) x <-> a .<_ x ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( k = K -> { a e. ( Atoms ` k ) | a ( le ` k ) x } = { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( k = K -> ( x e. ( Base ` k ) |-> { a e. ( Atoms ` k ) | a ( le ` k ) x } ) = ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_df-pmap | |- pmap = ( k e. _V |-> ( x e. ( Base ` k ) |-> { a e. ( Atoms ` k ) | a ( le ` k ) x } ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` K ) e. _V |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_mptex | |- ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) e. _V |
| 19 | 14, 15, 18 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( K e. _V -> ( pmap ` K ) = ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 19 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( K e. _V -> M = ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( K e. C -> M = ( x e. B |-> { a e. A | a .<_ x } ) ) |
